info.author: NeuroKode Labs, LLC
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
PDO: Python Database Objects, is a collection of objects for use with Phase or 
with the Python Programing Language. PDO is designed to be robust and simple at 
the same time, allowing access to multiple styles of databases, with one set of 
instructions. This means never having to worry again about your syntax when 
changing Database Platforms on your next project.
info.keywords: PDO, DB-SIG, DB-API 2.0, Databases, Python, Objects, Modules
info.name: Python-Database-Objects-PDO
info.summary: Python Database Objects, is a series of Objects that are used with the DB-API 2.0
info.html_description: PDO: Python Database Objects, is a collection of objects for use with Phase or with the Python Programing Language. PDO is designed to be robust and simple at the same time, allowing access to multiple styles of databases, with one set of instructions. This means never having to worry again about your syntax when changing Database Platforms on your next project.
